turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to oder coffee

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to get

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Do you have a menu where i can check

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure let me get that for you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: not a problem, here you go this is the menu we have

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: hmm great let see what catches my eye

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ok i am ready to order

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to have Chai Latte

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: please add some foam on it

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: how much do i owe you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: thank you, have a nice day
